page.title: 14INVERURIE POLICE STATION
page.content:
The police station is situated in the High Street. There are 17 constables, 3 sergeants, 1 inspector and 1 chief inspector stationed there. They work shifts with 5 constables and 1 sergeant on duty at one time.
The main work of the police in Inverurie is dealing with road traffic. Most of the time they work in patrol cars, but more time recently is being spent on the beat.
They have 6 police vehicles - 5 cars and 1 Range Rover. They do not have any police dogs, but if required they can obtain a dog and handler from the main police station in Aberdeen. Any other services required can also be obtained from the Headquarters in Aberdeen. The police station is manned 24 hours each day.
